question: The length of perpendicular drawn from the point (3,-1,11) to the line $\frac{x}{2}=\frac{y-2}{3}=\frac{z-3}{4}$ is
explanation: Point P(3,-1,11). Line passes A(0,2,3) with direction $b(2,3,4)$.
Cross product $AP \times b = \begin{vmatrix}i&j&k\\3&-3&8\\2&3&4\end{vmatrix} = i(-12-24) - j(12-16) + k(9+6) = -36i + 4j + 15k$.
